md:
giải nghĩa từ "group" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Group (noun) - Nhóm
	+ Meaning: A number of people, animals, or things that are together or associated with each other.
	+ Example sentence: The group of friends went on a trip together.
	+ Related words: team, club, organization, community
	+ Antonyms: individual, solo, alone

* Group (verb) - Nhóm lại
	+ Meaning: To put people or things together in a group or category.
	+ Example sentence: The teacher grouped the students by their interests.
	+ Related words: categorize, classify, sort, assemble
	+ Antonyms: separate, divide, scatter

Note: Depending on the context, the word "group" can have different meanings and connotations. The above explanations are just some of the common meanings and uses of the word.
